verbs.description: bedog (third-person singular simple present bedogs, present participle bedogging, simple past and past participle bedogged)

entries.meaning: (transitive)  to follow like a dog, harass, torment; bully
examples: Bedogging this poor singer, that bebitching, Uniting too a host of damning “Pshas,” And reaped a plenteous harvest of applause; [...]
